TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ModelMethodContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 用來在物件不可直接存取時，叫用或方法。

span.span: Used to invoke the or method when the object is not directly accessible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，自訂的類別可以定義所參考的方法`SelectMethod`， `UpdateMethod`， `DeleteMethod`，以及`InsertMethod`資料繫結，以及這些方法的屬性可以有此類型的參數，並使用它來叫用方法.For example, a custom class can define the methods referred to by the `SelectMethod`, `UpdateMethod`, `DeleteMethod`, and `InsertMethod` properties for data binding, and those methods can have a parameter of this type and use it to invoke the method. 或者，而不是方法參數，屬性可以在方法中用來叫用方法。Alternatively, instead of a method parameter, the property can be used within a method to invoke the method. 使用具有 Web Form 模型繫結的教學課程系列，請參閱 < [ 模型繫結和 Web Form](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).
